en: My son, if thou wilt receive my words, And lay up my commandments with thee;
hmr: Ka naupa, ka thuhai hi i pawm a, Nangmaa ka thupêkhai hi i siekhâwl a,

en: So as to incline thine ear unto wisdom, And apply thy heart to understanding;
hmr: Chuonga varna tienga i na chu i sit a, Hrietthiemna tienga i lungril chu i hmang chun;

en: Yea, if thou cry after discernment, And lift up thy voice for understanding;
hmr: Anih, ngairuotdikna chu i ko a, Hrietthiemna koa i râwl în suo bawk a,

en: If thou seek her as silver, And search for her as for hid treasures:
hmr: Tangka anga i zawng a, Ro phûm rûkhai anga i zawng suok chun;

en: Then shalt thou understand the fear of Jehovah, And find the knowledge of God.
hmr: LALPA ṭitna chu hung hre tâng i ta, Pathien hrietna chu hmu suok tâng i tih.

en: For Jehovah giveth wisdom; Out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding:
hmr: LALPA chun varna a pêk sih a; A baua inthawk chun hrietna le hrietthiemna hung suok a tih.

en: He layeth up sound wisdom for the upright; He is a shield to them that walk in integrity;
hmr: Mi tluong ta ding chun varna hrisêl chu a siekhâwl a; Lungril ṭhataka fetuhai ta ding chun phaw a nih.

en: That he may guard the paths of justice, And preserve the way of his saints.
hmr: Rorêlna lampuihai chu a vênghim theina ding le, A mi inthienghai lampui chu a vawngṭhatna dingin.

en: Then shalt thou understand righteousness and justice, And equity, yea, every good path.
hmr: Chun, rorêlna le felna chu hung hrethiem tâng i ta, Thlierbîk nei nawna chu, anih, lampui ṭha tinrêng el le chun.

en: For wisdom shall enter into thy heart, And knowledge shall be pleasant unto thy soul;
hmr: Varna chu i lungrila chun hung lût a ta, I hringna ta ding chun hrietna chu inhawitina nîng a tih.

en: Discretion shall watch over thee; Understanding shall keep thee:
hmr: Ngairuot thiemna chun nangma chu vêng a ti cheh a, Hrietthiemna chun kawl tlat a ti che;

en: To deliver thee from the way of evil, From the men that speak perverse things;
hmr: Mi rilo lampuia inthawka sansuok ding che le, Thil khawhlohai hriltuhaia inthawka sansuok ding chein;

en: Who forsake the paths of uprightness, To walk in the ways of darkness;
hmr: Inthimna lampui hraw dinga, Felna lampuihai nghatsantuhaia inthawk le,

en: Who rejoice to do evil, And delight in the perverseness of evil;
hmr: Rîtlona thaw kawnga hlimtuhai, Mi rilo khawhlonaa lâwm hlaktuhaia inthawk le,

en: Who are crooked in their ways, And wayward in their paths:
hmr: An lampuihaia mi kâwihai, An lampuihai pêtsantuhaia inthawkin.

en: To deliver thee from the strange woman, Even from the foreigner that flattereth with her words;
hmr: Hmêlmak nuhmeia inthawka sansuok ding chein, A bâuthluma zaihlêmtu che, ram dang mi ngeia inthawk chun;

en: That forsaketh the friend of her youth, And forgetteth the covenant of her God:
hmr: A tleirâwl lai ṭhien chu nghatsan a, A Pathien thuthlung theinghiltua inthawk chun.

en: For her house inclineth unto death, And her paths unto the dead;
hmr: A in chun thina chu ân nghâi zing a, A lampuihai chu thinaah:

en: None that go unto her return again, Neither do they attain unto the paths of life:
hmr: A mânu kuoma fetu chu tukhawm an hung kîr nâwk ta nawh a, Hringna lampuihai khawm chu an pâw phâk ngai bawk nawh;

en: That thou mayest walk in the way of good men, And keep the paths of the righteous.
hmr: Mi ṭhahai lampui chu i hraw theina ding le, Mi fel lampuihai chu i hraw theina dingin.

en: For the upright shall dwell in the land, And the perfect shall remain in it.
hmr: Mi tluong chu rama chun chêng a ta, Mi ṭha famkim chu a um zing ding a ni sih a.

en: But the wicked shall be cut off from the land, And the treacherous shall be rooted out of it.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, mi khawhlo chu rama inthawka sât thlâk nîng a ta, Bawsetuhai chu amaa inthawk chun zunga phawi hmangin um an tih.
